text: Çok şükür, sen hak ettiğin uç beyliğine...
english: Thank goodness, you finally got the border lordship you deserved...

text: ...bizse hak ettiğimiz uç beyine kavuştuk sonunda.
english: ...and we finally got the border lord we deserved.
Thanks.

text: Kılıçların verdiği hüküm, gene kılıçla bozulur.
english: Judgment delivered by the sword can only be overturned by the sword. If
we ever drew our weapons from their sheath... it was because
we were waiting for the moment of revenge.

text: Bundan gayrı on yıl boyunca yürüttüğümüz nizam neyse...

remains the same. And what will

text: Kurt gözünü karartınca sürüyü hesaba katmaz.
english: wolf becomes blinded by rage, it doesn't consider the flock. When

text: Vakti geldiğinde hakkımızı kara çelikle nasıl aldığımızı herkese gösterdik.
english: the time came, we showed everyone how we claimed what was rightfully ours, with black steel. Speaking

text: Gayrı uç beyliği üzerinde söz söylemek Alıncak’ın boyunu aşar.
english: about the border principality is beyond Alıncak's capabilities. He is

text: Ne o uç beyliği verecek kadar güçlüdür...
english: neither powerful enough to grant the border principality ...

text: ...ne de Umuroğulları uç beyliğini alacak kadar.
english: ...nor powerful enough to take the Umuroğlu principality. We've

text: Sen olmazsan başımıza neler gelirmiş hepimiz en acı şekilde gördük.
english: all seen in the most painful way what would have happened to us if you hadn't been here.
From now on, at the slightest threat... we are with you with everything we
have, Ertuğrul Bey. The
bad shepherd leads the flock to the cliff.
But as long as you are in charge...
...we will shield all hunters with our lives.
Our traditions are clear. Unity is the
foundation of peace. If

text: Biz bir olursak, kimsenin bizi kırmaya gücü yetmez.
english: we stand together, no one can break us . From

text: Bundan gayrı Söğüt’e hepimiz canımızı siper edeceğiz.
english: now on, we will all risk our lives to protect Söğüt.

text: Bizim gözle görülmeyen, elle çizilmeyen hudutlarımız vardır.
english: We have invisible, intangible boundaries.

text: Bu hudutlar ezelden çizilmiştir ve bütün cihanı kaplar.
english: These boundaries were drawn from time immemorial and encompass the entire universe. Those who
cannot afford to grow...
...are doomed to shrink. From
now on...
...every step we take here... ...
will be taken with an eye to the future, 1000 years from now... ...1000 years beyond our borders. Since
we do not wish to be wiped out from the face of the earth...
...then we will spread throughout the world.
(Emotional music) Now we will
spring from the bow, piercing through everything in our path...
...and heading towards our goal.
Our armor is faith, our weapon is justice...
...our goal is world order, God willing.

english: Ertuğrul considers us friends right now. To
hell with Ertuğrul!

far more important than our friendship with Ertuğrul!

Damn! Ah! Ah!
All the papers are ruined.
Everything is gone.
